title: Twitter : number of monetizable daily active U.S. users 2017 to 2019
yAxis: Number of monetizable daily active users in millions
summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Number of monetizable daily active users in millions in the y axis.
Quarter Q4 '19 has the highest Number of monetizable daily active users in millions and Q4 '17 has the lowest Number of monetizable daily active users in millions.
The highest Quarter Q4 '19 has 6.0 more Number of monetizable daily active users in millions than the lowest Quarter Q4 '17.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Number of monetizable daily active users in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Number of monetizable daily active users in millions 31.0 is found at Quarter Q4 '19 and the minimum is found at Q4 '17 where Quarter is 25.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Number of monetizable daily active users in millions in the y axis.
Quarter Q4 '19 has the highest Number of monetizable daily active users in millions and Q4 '17 has the lowest Number of monetizable daily active users in millions.
The highest Quarter Q4 '19 has 6.0 more Number of monetizable daily active users in millions than the lowest Quarter Q4 '17.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of monetizable daily active users in millions for 12 number of Quarters.
Quarter Q4 '19 has the highest Number of monetizable daily active users in millions and Q4 '17 has the lowest Number of monetizable daily active users in millions.
The highest Quarter Q4 '19 has 6.0 more Number of monetizable daily active users in millions than the lowest Quarter Q4 '17.
Number of monetizable daily active users in millions at Quarter Q4 '19 is 31.0 , second place is Q3 '19 at 30.0, and thirdly is Q2 '19 at 29.0.
The Number of monetizable daily active users in millions has declined over the past 12 Quarters.
Quarter Q3 '18, Q2 '18, Q1 '18, Q3 '17, and Q1 '17 share the same value 26.0.
Considered together, the average Number of monetizable daily active users in millions in all 12 Quarters is roughly 27.08.
The Number of monetizable daily active users in millions is 325.0 if we add up values of all Quarters.
